metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2175 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Apache PDFBox before 1.8.12 and 2.x before 2.0.1 does not properly initialize the XML parsers, which allows context-dependent attackers to conduct XML External Entity (XXE) attacks via a crafted PDF.

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
